channel.title: Home on studybox.io
channel.description: Recent content in Home on studybox.io

item.title: Step 1 - taking notes
item.description: It takes a few seconds to note down something in your Studybox. Vocabularies, Phrases, anything you want to remember.

item.title: Step 2 - That's it
item.description: That’s right, there is no step 2! Studybox creates a revision schedule for every note you have taken. Your notes will be sent to your email inbox just before you are about to forget them.
